longBusinessSummary: Aditya Birla Money Limited provides financial services in India. It operates through Broking, Whole Debt Market, and Others segment. The company offers stock broking and portfolio management, depository, and e-insurance repository solutions, as well as distributes other financial products. It is also involved in equity and derivative trading through NSE and BSE; currency derivative through MCX-SX; and commodities trading through MCX and NCDEX, as well as invests in securities. In addition, the company provides TradeLite, a trading app; Mobile Invest, a mobile trading app to track and trade equities and derivatives; AB TRADE, an advanced trading web portal with fundamentals, charting, 15mins built up, and other; and Express Trade, a desktop trading application. Further, it offers life and health insurance; mutual fund, ETF, and PMS investment products; home, business, and personal loans; investment in national pension scheme, SGB, debt securities, IPOs, and stock SIP.The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Chennai, India. Aditya Birla Money Limited operates as a subsidiary of Aditya Birla Capital Limited.
